name: RDA Enterprises
tag_list: it, network, crm, consulting, identity, security, web, portal, development, custom, programming, management
overview:
RDA Enterprises, Inc. is a full-service network integrator providing resources to design, implement and support all Information Technology needs.

With over 24 years of experience, RDA consistently strives to provide our wide variety of valued clients with the expertise of our staff, leading-edge technology solutions and quality custom-made or best-of-breed brand products.

Headquartered in the heart of midtown Manhattan, with satellite locations on both the east and west coasts, RDA is strategically positioned to meet the specific requirements of each of our clients, regardless of size and location. With established partnerships with manufacturers and vendors, RDA is able to offer cost-effective value-added solutions.
